document_data.caption: A [[basilisk]] adorned with a [[gold]]en collar
document_data.name: Collar
document_data.mainbody: A '''collar''' was a band put around the necks of animals in order to harness or restrain them, often with the aid of a [[leash]].
document_data.Description: Collars were typically made of leather or some form of metal. as was common with collars worn by [[war dog]]s.
document_data.Availability: * [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']] sold [[chain]] [[leash]] and collar assemblies fit for use on common [[cat]]s (2 [[sp]]) and [[dog]]s (4-5 sp), [[wolves]] (6 sp), and [[dire wolves]] (8 sp).<ref>
document_data.Notable Collars:
* ''[[Collar of animal control]]'', [[enchanted]] leather collars that created an effect similar to the ''[[dominate animal]]'' [[spell]].{{Cite dungeon/103/Forest of Blood|57-58}}
* ''[[Collar of protection]]'', enchanted collars from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] that were made in a variety of different materials, but all had defensive enchantments ranging from ''+1'' to ''+5''.{{Cite polyhedron/82/Magnificent Magic|13}}
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Aocha]], a domesticated [[huge spider]] owned by [[Zack Boosenburry]], wore a leather collar.<ref>
* [[Esper]], the cat [[familiar]] of the [[alchemist]] [[Dasanara Espara]], wore a leather collar with runes engraved in it.<ref>
* [[Ring (pseudodragon)|Ring]], a [[pseudodragon]] familiar owned by the mage [[Meme]], wore a [[mithril]] collar that allowed him to make a powerful casting of ''[[stoneskin]]'' once per day.<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Foreclosure|10}}
* [[Scratch (dog)|Scratch]], a dog belonging to the courier [[Gomwick]], wore a leather collar inscribed with his name.
* The fabled creature that was the namesake of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Black Dog Alley]] was said to wear a spiked collar.
